00035 #ifndef __HTTPD_FS_H__
00036 #define __HTTPD_FS_H__
00037 
00038 #define HTTPD_FS_STATISTICS 1
00039 
00040 struct httpd_fs_file {
00041   char *data;
00042   int len;
00043 };
00044 
00045 /* file must be allocated by caller and will be filled in
00046    by the function. */
00047 int httpd_fs_open(const char *name, struct httpd_fs_file *file);
00048 
00049 #ifdef HTTPD_FS_STATISTICS
00050 #if HTTPD_FS_STATISTICS == 1
00051 u16_t httpd_fs_count(char *name);
00052 #endif /* HTTPD_FS_STATISTICS */
00053 #endif /* HTTPD_FS_STATISTICS */
00054 
00055 void httpd_fs_init(void);
00056 
00057 #endif /* __HTTPD_FS_H__ */
